title: Translation of robotics resources
description: Help Women in Robotics translate robotics-related content to other languages.

title: Content Creation
description: Create content for the Women in Robotics newsletter and socials.

title: Wikipedia Edit-a-thon event Co-Organizers
description: Help Women in Robotics plan our first Wiki Edit-a-thon event to help increase the representation of women in robotics on Wikipedia.

title: Wikipedia Edit-a-thon event Participants
description: Join Women in Robotics during our first Wiki Edit-a-thon event to help increase the representation of women in robotics on Wikipedia.

title: Online Community AMA Organizers
description: Find Women in Robotics speakers for online AMAs, promote and provide questions

title: Online Interest Group Moderators
description: Start conversations online about your favorite topics (research, books, robotics events, etc.)

description: 2024 onwards - help to coordinate next Mentoring Program

title: Chapter organizer relations
description: Help connect Women in Robotics to local chapters
